title: 2nd Prize — AI Samasya Hackathon
description: Won 2nd Prize at the AI Samasya Hackathon during the International Conclave on Generative AI, Thiruvananthapuram (2024). Developed an AI-based learning platform tailored for visually impaired learners. Designed frontend using React.js and backend services with Flask. Demonstrated real-world application of Generative AI in inclusive education.

title: NER Internship — PixDynamics Pvt. Ltd.
description: Completed a one-month industry internship at PixDynamics Pvt. Ltd. (May–June 2024) at Infopark, Kochi. Gained hands-on experience in data preparation, annotation, and implementation of Named Entity Recognition (NER) models using PaddleOCR and LabelImg.

title: Technical Team Member — IEDC, CUSAT
description: Contributed to technical development and innovation activities of the Innovation and Entrepreneurship Development Cell (IEDC) at CUSAT. Supported organizing hackathons, workshops, and student-led projects. Actively involved in promoting a culture of innovation, entrepreneurship, and technology-driven solutions.

title: Google Cloud Deployment
description: Successfully deployed the MediConnect telemedicine application on Google Cloud Platform, demonstrating proficiency in cloud hosting, scalable infrastructure, and DevOps workflows.
